array.name: docs_upload_instructions
array.item: Original photo (No copy)
A clear photo of both Front and Back
Data on Aadhar card should be clearly visible
No Mobile Aadhar card is accepted

array.name: gen_instructions_arr
array.item: This pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This pass is only valid till the expiry date.
It is mandatory to show your pass to authorised persons upon request.
Your pass may be cancelled without a refund in the event of misuse or fraud.

array.name: gen_instructions_arr_aictsl
array.item: This pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This pass is only valid till the expiry date.
This pass is only valid in AICTSL buses.
Students, senior citizens and the physically challenged can avail discounted passes by submitting\10 additional documents.
It is mandatory to show your pass to authorised persons upon request.
We reserve the right to cancel your pass without a refund in the event of misuse or fraud.

array.name: gen_instructions_arr_astc
array.item: This pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This pass is only valid till the expiry date.
This pass is valid in all the ASTC buses.
It is mandatory to show your pass to authorised persons upon request.
We reserve the right to cancel your pass without a refund in the event of misuse or fraud.

array.name: gen_instructions_arr_bcll
array.item: This pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This pass is only valid till the expiry date.
This pass is only valid in Mybuses.
Students, senior citizens and the physically challenged can avail discounted passes by submitting\10 additional documents.
It is mandatory to show your pass to authorised persons upon request.
We reserve the right to cancel your pass without a refund in the event of misuse or fraud.

array.name: gen_instructions_arr_bsrtc
array.item: This pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This pass is only valid till the expiry date.
This pass is valid in all the BSRTC buses except routes 100, 200, 444, 777, 888, 888A.
Students and women can avail discounted passes by submitting additional documents.
It is mandatory to show your pass to authorised persons upon request.
We reserve the right to cancel your pass without a refund in the event of misuse or fraud.

array.name: gen_instructions_arr_dkboa
array.item: This pass is valid for travel only on the specified route(s).
This pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This pass is only valid till the expiry date.
It is mandatory to show your pass to authorised persons upon request.
Your pass may be cancelled without a refund in the event of misuse or fraud.

array.name: gen_instructions_arr_jctsl
array.item: This pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This pass is only valid till the expiry date.
This pass is only valid in Metro Buses.
Students, senior citizens and the physically challenged can avail discounted passes by submitting\10 additional documents.
It is mandatory to show your pass to authorised persons upon request.
We reserve the right to cancel your pass without a refund in the event of misuse or fraud.

array.name: kochi_beta_instructions
array.item: Some buses may not show up
Fares may not be accurate
Timings may differ

array.name: mticket_instructions_arr_cstc
array.item: This ticket is only valid for WBTC buses.
This ticket is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This ticket is only valid for next 24 hours.
After activation, the ticket is only valid for one hour.
Upon request, It's mandatory to show your ticket to authorised personnel.

array.name: scan_pay_instructions_arr
array.item: This ticket is non-transferable and non-refundable.
This ticket is only valid till the expiry date.
It is mandatory to show your ticket to authorised persons upon request.
Your ticket may be cancelled without a refund in the event of misuse or fraud.
